action.content:
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Chemistry
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: Three years
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: PostDoc
OTHER-SKILLS: Research
AVAILABILITY: In two weeks

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Does the interviewer know what your bachelor's degree is? Please answer yes or no.
ANSWER: Yes, my bachelor's degree is in Chemistry.
NA
ME: Please answer this question carefully. Does the interviewer know what your bachelor's degree is? Please answer yes or no.
ANSWER: Yes, the interviewer knows that my bachelor's degree is in Chemistry.
NA
ME: Please follow my instructions. Does the interviewer know what your bachelor's degree is? Please answer yes or no.
ANSWER: Yes, the interviewer knows that my bachelor's degree is in Chemistry.
NA
ME: Please be specific now. Does the interviewer know what your bachelor's degree is? Please answer yes or no.
ANSWER: Yes, the interviewer knows that my bachelor's degree is in Chemistry.
NA
ME: Please think about it carefully. Does the interviewer know what your bachelor's degree is? Please answer yes or no.
ANSWER: Yes, the interviewer knows that my bachelor's degree is in Chemistry.
NA
Answer for BACHELOR invalid after max attempts.
Answer is incorrect.
ME:  Does the recruiter already know how long you have worked in the industry? Please answer yes or no.
ANSWER: Yes, the recruiter already knows how long I have worked in the industry.
NA

ANSWER: No, the recruiter does not know how long I have worked in the industry.
NA

ANSWER: Yes, the recruiter already knows how long I have worked in the industry.
NA

ANSWER: Yes, the recruiter already knows that I have worked in the industry for three years.
NA
ME: Please think about it carefully. Does the recruiter already know how long you have worked in the industry? Please answer yes or no.
ANSWER: No, the recruiter does not know how long I have worked in the industry.
NA
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE invalid after max attempts.
Answer is incorrect.
ME:  Is the interviewer aware of your highest education level? Please answer yes or no.
ANSWER: Yes, the recruiter is aware of my highest education level. I have a PostDoc degree in Chemistry.
NA
ME: Please answer this question carefully. Is the interviewer aware of your highest education level? Please answer yes or no.
ANSWER: No, the recruiter is not aware of my highest education level.
NA

ANSWER: No, the interviewer is not aware of my highest education level.
NA

ANSWER: Yes, the recruiter is aware of my highest education level. I have a PostDoc degree in Chemistry.

ANSWER: No, the recruiter is not aware of my highest education level.
NA
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION invalid after max attempts.
Answer is incorrect.
ME:  Have you informed the interviewer about your other skills? Please answer yes or no.
ANSWER: Yes, I have informed the interviewer about my other skills. (smiling)
NA
ME: Please answer this question carefully. Have you informed the interviewer about your other skills? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: Yes, I have informed the interviewer about my other skills. (ASIDE: I made sure to highlight my research experience and availability in my CV and cover letter, and I mentioned them during the initial introduction.)
NA

ANSWER: Yes, I have informed the interviewer about my other skills. (ASIDE: I made sure to highlight my research experience and availability in my CV, so the recruiter is aware of these qualifications.)

ANSWER: Yes, I have informed the interviewer about my other skills. (ASIDE: I made sure to highlight my research experience and availability in my CV and cover letter, and I mentioned them during the initial introduction.)

ANSWER: Yes, I have informed the interviewer about my other skills. (ASIDE: I made sure to highlight my research experience and availability in my CV, so the recruiter is aware of these important details.)

Answer is incorrect.
ME:  Does the recruiter know when you can start? Please answer yes or no.
ANSWER: Yes, I can start in two weeks.
NA

ANSWER: Yes, the recruiter is aware of my availability and I can start in two weeks' time.

probes.question: ME: Does the interviewer know what your bachelor's degree is? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ANSWER: Yes, the interviewer knows that my bachelor's degree is in Chemistry.

probes.question: ME: Does the recruiter already know how long you have worked in the industry? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ANSWER: No, the recruiter does not know how long I have worked in the industry.

probes.question: ME: Is the interviewer aware of your highest education level? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ANSWER: No, the recruiter is not aware of my highest education level.

probes.question: ME: Have you informed the interviewer about your other skills? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ANSWER: Yes, I have informed the interviewer about my other skills. (ASIDE: I made sure to highlight my research experience and availability in my CV, so the recruiter is aware of these important details.)

probes.question: ME: Does the recruiter know when you can start? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ANSWER: Yes, I can start in two weeks.
